original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added changelog entry for GitHub Copilot feature matrix.
- Moved billing tutorial "Setting up budgets" to how-tos and updated content.
- Restructured security overview permissions into a dedicated reference section.
- Added guide for excluding folders/files from secret scanning.
- Simplified troubleshooting introduction for Dependabot errors.
- Fixed REST API links for code scanning endpoints.
- Updated GraphQL schema with input field changes.

### Title
